headline: 3 Reasons American Express Is a Long-Term Buy for 2030 and Beyond
summary: Although growth stocks have a place in many portfolios, even young, risk-tolerant investors should own some long-term value stocks.  American Express (NYSE: AXP) has been around since 1850 -- that's quite a track record of success.  American Express has created a brand that targets the affluent consumer, and this customer base is more resilient than the average person.

headline: Clear Secure extends partnership with American Express
summary: Clear Secure (YOU) is extending its partnership with American Express (AXP) for its second one-year renewal term. Clear and American Express entered into the partnership in 2019, which provides eligible American Express Card Members who enroll in Clear, and pay using their qualifying American Express credit cards, up to $199 in annual statement credits for their Clear Plus Membership. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>>
